projectDesc.p: The Göttingen Register of Electronic Texts in Indian Languages (GRETIL) is a resource platform providing standardized machine-readable texts in Indian languages that have been contributed by various individuals and institutions.

correction.p: Apparent errors have been silently corrected.

normalization.p: GRETIL normalizes all texts contributed consistently for each language. Sanskrit texts are normalized in accordance with the scheme of the International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration (IAST) in order to facilitate word search across its corpus without additional transformations.

All characters that were fully equivalent to an IAST-conformant character in the text file contributed have been made to conform to the character list below. Non-conformant characters with additional information including accents, capitalization, and whitespace have been preserved as orig elements inside choice elements with their IAST-conformant equivalent in reg elements for the creation of a plain text. These additional informations will be available only in those transformations of this file that display the original information.

quotation.p: If indicated unambiguously in the text file contributed quotation marks have been replaced with the q element and, in case a reference was provided, have been nested inside a cit with the respective reference provided in a ref element after the quote.

segmentation.p: Unnumbered div elements are used to structure the text, using the type and n attributes in accordance with the refsDecl.

interpretation.p:
Interpretive markup which is visible only in analytic transformations of this file consists of:
Highlighting in hi elements,
Corruptions in sic elements,
Remarks in note elements with the resp attribute identifying the agency.

refsDecl.p:
A reference is given in the xml:id attributes consisting of
a pragmatic abbreviation of the title: Paramārthasāra = PAS,
the number of the verse in arabic numerals.

lg.l: paraṃ parasyāḥ prakṛter anādim ekaṃ niviṣṭaṃ bahudhā guhāsu |
sarvālayaṃ sarvacarācarasthaṃ tvām eva viṣṇuṃ śaranaṃ prapadye ||
ātmāmburāśau nikhilo 'pi loko magno 'pi nācāmati nekṣate ca |
āścaryam etan mṛgatṛṣṇikābhe bhavāmburāśau ramate mṛṣaiva ||
jagad ālokya nimagnaṃ prāha guruṃ prāñjaliḥ śiṣyaḥ ||
dīrghe 'smin saṃsāre saṃsarataḥ kasya kena sambandhaḥ |
karma śubhāśubhaphaladam anubhavati gatāgatair iha kaḥ ||
iti gaditapūrvavākyaiḥ prakṛtiṃ puruṣaṃ ca me brūhi ||
ity ādhāro bhagavān pṛṣṭaḥ śiṣyeṇa taṃ sa hovāca |
viduṣām apy atigahanaṃ vaktavyam idaṃ śṛṇu tathāpi tvam ||
satyam iva jagad asatyaṃ mūlaprakṛter idaṃ kṛtaṃ yena |
avyaktād aṇḍam abhūd aṇḍād brahmā tataḥ prajāsargaḥ |
māyāmayī pravṛttiḥ saṃhriyata iyaṃ punaḥ kramaśaḥ ||
tadadhiṣṭātā dehī sacetano 'pi na karoti kiṃcid api ||
yadvad acetanam api san nikaṭasthe bhrāmake bhramati loham |
yadvat savitary udite karoti karmāṇi jīvaloko 'yam |
na ca tāni karoti ravir na kārayati tadvad ātmāpi ||
tadvad upādher guṇabhāvitasya bhāvaṃ vibhur dhatte ||
gacchati gacchati salile dinakarabimbaṃ sthite sthitiṃ yāti |
antaḥkaraṇe gacchati gacchaty ātmāpi tadvad iha ||
rāhur adṛśyo 'pi yathā śaśibimbasthaḥ prakāśate jagati |
sarvagataṃ nirupamam advaitaṃ tac cetasā gamyam |
yad buddhigataṃ brahmopalabhyate śiṣya bodhyaṃ tat ||
mṛgatṛṣṇāyām udakaṃ śuktau rajataṃ bhujaṃgamo rajjvām |
yadvad dinakara eko vibhāti salilāśayeṣu sarveṣu |
kham iva ghaṭādiṣv antar bahiḥ sthitaṃ brahma sarvapiṇḍeṣu |
amalaḥ sakṛd vibhātaś cetana ātmā khavad vyāpī ||
rajjvāṃ nāsti bhujaṃgaḥ sarpabhayaṃ bhavati hetunā kena |
tadvad dvaitavikalpabhrāntir avidyā na satyam idam ||
etat tad andhakāraṃ yad anātmany ātmatā bhrāntyā |
na vidanti vāsudevaṃ sarvātmānaṃ narā mūḍhāḥ ||
upalabhate svayam evaṃ guhāgataṃ puruṣam ātmānam ||
jvalanād dhūmodgatibhir vividhākṛtir ambare yathā bhāti |
tadvad viṣṇau sṛṣṭiḥ svamāyayā dvaitavistarā bhāti ||
śānta iva manasi sānte hṛṣṭe hṛṣṭa iva mūḍha iva mūḍhe |
vyavahārastho na punaḥ paramārthata īśvaro bhavati ||
eksaminn api ca ghaṭe dhūmādimalavṛte śeṣāḥ |
na bhavanti malopetā yadvad jīvo 'pi tadvad iha ||
dehendriyeṣu niyatāḥ karma guṇāḥ kurvate svabhogārtham |
nāhaṃ kartā na mameti jānataḥ karma naiva badhnāti ||
anyaśarīreṇa kṛtaṃ karma bhaved yena deha utpannaḥ |
tad avaśyaṃ bhoktavyaṃ bhogād eva kṣayo 'sya nirdiṣṭaḥ ||
bījam iva dahanadagdhaṃ janmasamarthaṃ na tad bhavati ||
jñānotpatter ūrdhvaṃ kriyamānaṃ karma yat tad api nāma |
na śliṣyati kartāraṃ puṣkarapattraṃ yathā vāri ||
vāgdehamānasair iha karmacayaḥ kriyata iti buddhāḥ prāhuḥ |
eko 'pi nāham eṣāṃ kartā tatkarmaṇāṃ nāsmi ||
yadvad iṣīkātūlaṃ pavanoddhūtaṃ hi daśa diśo yāti |
kṣīrād uddhṛtam ājyaṃ kṣiptaṃ yadvan na pūrvavat tasmin |
yadvad deho 'vayavā mṛd eva tasya vikārajātāni |
te guṇasaṃgamadoṣād baddhā iva dhānyajātayaḥ svatuṣaiḥ |
janma labhante tāvad yāvan na jñānavahninā dagdhāḥ ||
kurute sṛṣṭim avidyā sarvatra spṛśyate tayā nātmā ||
rajjvāṃ bhujaṃgahetuḥ prabhavavināśau yathā na staḥ |
jagadutpattivināśau na ca kāraṇam asti tadvad iha ||
tāvan māyāpāśaiḥ saṃsāre baddha iva bhāti ||
himaphenabudbudā iva jalasya dhūmo yathā vahneḥ |
yadvat salile salilaṃ kṣīre kṣiraṃ samīraṇe vāyuḥ |
tadvad brahmaṇi vimale bhāvanayā tanmayatvam upayāti ||
ko mohaḥ kaḥ śokaḥ sarvaṃ brahmāvalokayataḥ ||
vigatopādhiḥ sphaṭikaḥ svaprabhayā bhāti nirmalo yadvat |
draṣṭā śrotā ghrātā sparśayitā rasayitā grahītā ca |
ākāśavad akhilam idaṃ na kaścid apy atra saṃdehaḥ ||
sarvākāro bhagavān upāsyate yena yena bhāvena |
taṃ taṃ bhāvaṃ bhūtvā cintāmaṇivat samabhyeti ||
ātmajñas tarati śucaṃ yasmād vidvān bibheti na kutaścit |
mṛtyor api maraṇabhayaṃ na bhavaty anyat kutas tasya ||
paramārthatattvam etad yad ato 'nyat tad anṛtaṃ sarvam ||
dagdhe ca janmabīje paramātmānaṃ hariṃ yāti ||
mokṣasya naiva kiṃcid dhāmāsti na cāpi gamanam anyatra |
ajñānamayagranther bhedo yas taṃ vidur mokṣam ||
buddhvaivam asatyam idaṃ viṣṇor māyātmakaṃ jagadrūpam |
buddhvā vibhaktāṃ prakṛtiṃ puruṣaḥ saṃsāramadhyago bhavati |
aśnan yadvā tadvā saṃvīto yena kenacic chāntaḥ |
yatra kvacana ca śāyī vimucyate sarvabhūtātmā ||
paramārthavin na puṇyair na ca pāpaiḥ spṛśyate vimalaḥ ||
nirupamaparamānandaṃ yo veda sa tanmayo bhavati ||
tīrthe śvapacagṛhe vā naṣṭasmṛtir api parityajan deham |
vṛkṣāgrāc cyutapādo yadvad anicchan naraḥ kṣitau patati |
viṣayeṣu sārvabhaumaḥ sarvajanaiḥ pūjyate yathā rājā |
mahatā kālena mahān mānuṣyaṃ prāpya yogam abhyasya |
prāpnoti divyam amṛtaṃ yat tat paramaṃ padaṃ viṣṇoḥ ||
vedāntaśāstram akhilaṃ vilokya śeṣas tu jagadādhāraḥ |
